business_profile.tagline_slogan: The leading software development company in South Africa
business_profile.short_description: Liorra is an award-winning, custom software development company that designs, builds and launches world-class software solutions at high speed while saving costs.
business_profile.long_description_about_us: Our firm's aim is always to take the product to market as quickly as possible and use iterative software development approach until we achieve all business goals, fulfil market & user needs, and develop unique differentiators and features.
unique_selling_proposition_usp: Access to the latest training and knowledge of the industry
Africa's leading custom software development firm
Cost-effective services and rapid project completion
Custom app development designed with specific target audience in mind
Helps companies at any stage of the product software development cycle

products.name: Tap-Tap
products.description: A peer-to-peer mobile payment solution powered by Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE) technology which makes it safe and simple to make and receive in person mobile payments.
features: Tap-on-phone – The Payment SDK will allow small merchants to accept contactless card payments directly on their smartphone, without requiring expensive payment acceptance devices.

Proximity payments – The payment SDK will allow anyone to make and accept payments to anyone nearby through Bluetooth. This is particularly attractive as the payment experience emulates that of ApplePay, SamsungPay, etc. but does not require the device to have an NFC sensor and works on low-end smartphones.

services.name: Cloud Security
services.scope: Help organisations to predict, prevent, detect, and respond to attacks in IaaS, PaaS, and SaaS cloud implementations, across multiple providers, at all stages of adoption

services.name: Custom Software Development
services.scope: Helps companies at any stage of the product software development cycle: from R&D and building MVP from scratch, to scaling, UX analyzing, management and consultation.

services.name: Cyber Defence
services.scope: Use our extensive knowledge of real-world attacker TTPs to deliver effective offensive, defensive and collaborative client engagements across various specialties

services.name: DevSecOps Consultancy
services.scope: Help organisations to improve or adapt security practices in their software development process

services.name: Digital Forensics and IR
services.scope: Provide incident readiness consultancy services to help organisations prepare for cyber-attack as well as rapid assistance for security breaches, containing the incident to allow effective remediation and recovery

services.name: Hybrid App Development
services.scope: Utilizing the latest in hybrid app frameworks like React Native and Flutter, we create apps that run smoothly on both iOS and Android from a single codebase, speeding up development and reducing costs.

services.name: Maintenance and Support
services.scope: We ensure your systems is always up and running, and there are constant improvements made.

services.name: Managed Services
services.scope: Provide continuous services that assist clients in managing their internet-exposed estates, through external asset mapping and vulnerability management services

services.name: Mobile App Development
services.scope: We use hybrid technologies that lets us ship your app to market, faster, while still maintaining a world-class mobile user experience.

services.name: Product design & Prototyping
services.scope: Our team will help you bring your idea into a reality. We design world-class apps & systems that will delight your users and achieve business goals. This includes scoping the system, wire-framing and user interface designs.

services.name: Security Assurance
services.scope: Comprehensively assess web and mobile applications, the underlying APIs that they consume, as well as external and internal network infrastructure

services.name: Strategic Consultancy
services.scope: Utilise in-house security expertise to advise and consult on cyber security strategy, organisational maturity and security assurance testing roadmaps

services.name: Web Development
services.scope: We build world-class, robust web systems for scalability.

business_profile.free_trials_demos: Book Your Free Consultation – Transform Your Mobile Strategy Now!
customer_segments: Businesses in various sectors including retail, health and wellness, and fintech
use_cases_scenarios: Expanding on the demand for health and wellness apps
Investing in retail and delivery apps
pain_points_solved: Ensuring high-quality, uninterrupted service, robust security measures since we were dealing with financial services.
Using bluetooth technology to make and receive in person mobile payments.

customer_testimonials.quote: Liorra excels in software development by actively involving clients in the process. They maintain frequent, insightful, and professional communication and make themselves available for regular feedback sessions. Furthermore, they are receptive to suggestions and input, encouraging a collaborative approach.
The team was highly organized and internal stakeholders were particularly impressed with their ability to execute concepts and development prowess.

Their team of experts worked diligently to ensure that my app was designed and developed to meet my exact specifications. Their professionalism, attention to detail, and timely communication made the entire process smooth and stress-free.

press_mentions_media_coverage: Rated as South Africa's Top Mobile & Web Development Company by Clutch
business_profile.aggregated_company_summary: Liorra is an award-winning, custom software development and cybersecurity consultancy based in Sandton, South Africa, specializing in designing and launching high-quality digital products quickly and cost-effectively. With a team of 26 specialists, the company supports clients at every stage of the software development lifecycle—from MVP creation to scaling and cybersecurity resilience—while serving over 150 global businesses. Known for its technical excellence and client-centric approach, Liorra partners with startups and large corporations to deliver innovative, secure, and market-ready solutions tailored to Africa's unique challenges.

analysis.short_description: Liorra is an independent cyber security consultancy with research at the core of what we do. Solving our African unique cyber security challenges and ensuring they are more resilient to cyber-attacks is why we exist and continue to exist.
analysis.long_description_about_us: Liorra is renowned for its technical excellence and client-centric approach to solving cyber security challenges as well as software systems. From partnering with some of Africa’s most renowned startups, to advising large telecommunications and media corporations, our reputation of trust speaks for itself.
